name: MessageFactory_createRefreshErrorResponseTest
description: Unit tests for the MessageFactory's createRefreshErrorResponse method with different parameters.

test_cases.name: testCreateRefreshErrorResponse_WithErrorCode
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a refresh error response with just an error code.

test_cases.name: testCreateRefreshErrorResponse_WithErrorCodeAndReasonPhrase
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a refresh error response with an error code and a reason phrase.
